text.section: This section does not require the Commission or the employee organization to agree to any proposal or to make any concession.

section.section: Collective bargaining may not begin later than September 1 before the beginning of a fiscal year for which an agreement has not been reached between the Commission and the exclusive representative.
Collective bargaining shall conclude on or before the following February 1.
During the period between the dates set in paragraph (1)(i) and (ii) of this subsection, the parties shall negotiate in good faith.
